answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some links that might be helpful as a start to your search.
This article discusses best practices for writing RFP’s.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302081/Best_Practices_for_RFPs
This is a sample Governance Policy and Procedure from the City of Carrollton, TX.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/12087/Governance_Policy_and_Procedure
This is a sample Personnel Policy from the City of Healdsburg, CA.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/14819/Personnel_Rules_and_Regulations
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern 
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Roland Lane
text: Does anyone have a sample RFP for policy and procedure writing for a government agency?
title: Sample RFP for contract for Policy and Procedure manual
